name: Myth 3: The Wolf Age
description:
Myth 3: The Wolf Age is a strategy game developed by MumboJumbo. It came out on 01-10-2001. Take Two Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Myth 3: The Wolf Age on PC.
Sam Houser produced the game. It was scored by Zak Belica.
